channel.title: Help with Potions

item.title: Help with Potions
item.dc:creator: @M_A_R_T_Y M A R T Y
item.description:
@M_A_R_T_Y wrote:

None of my potions work, when i click them nothing happens. I think i need to add a case for each one(or replace my old one), not exactly sure though. Any help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2008, 01:04:20 PM[/size][hr]And i found my current str pot case for example

case 162: { if (actionTimer == 0) { { actionTimer = 10; stillgfx(401, absY, absX); for (int I = 0; I < 20; I++) {} for (int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) { strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break;

Read full topic
